content: free easy crochet pattern for adult add a vibrant pop of color to a bag purse or knapsack with plump crochet cherry charms stitched in red heart super saver this charm is perfect for giving your accessories a playful personalized touch have fun practicing essential techniques like single_crochet chain stitch and working in the round such a joy to create super saver gives you over 100 colors to customize a bunch of cherries for all your friends materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a hot red 0390 1 ball or 10 yds/9 m contrast b tea leaf 0624 1 ball or 2 yds/2 m measurement approx 4 10 cm tall including stems
